properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time in seconds for JWT tokens

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret used to sign JWT tokens

properties.name: sendgrid.reset-email-template
properties.description: Template ID for the reset password email

properties.name: sendgrid.verify-email-template
properties.description: Template ID for the verify email

properties.name: sendgrid.from-email
properties.description: Email address to send emails from
